patterns: What projects have you worked on?
responses: Sure! I'm Saif Mahammed, a front-end web developer with extraordinary UI skills, specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Redux, Tailwind, and RESTAPI. I've worked on several projects including Alpha Apex, Phantom Media, Movix, and Let Me Know. You can check out my portfolio for more details!
